website_summaries.verdict: Though they aren't fancy, this set offers reasonably quality and enough glasses for large groups at a price point that won't break your beer budget.
pros: This large set offers attractive glasses with simplistic, fuss-free design and sturdy construction
It's also an excellent value for your money, as you get 9 glasses for a surprisingly affordable price
cons: Some glasses have irregularities, such as uneven lips
A few consumers received the wrong size - 12 oz

customer_reviews.title: Dishwasher safe and all around sturdy glasses. Period
customer_reviews.text: Listen,I have bought hundreds, if not a thousand things off of Amazon. I, for the life of me, cannot figure out why someone would give these glasses a bad rating. It is a thick, sturdy and well made glass. What else do you need? I drink milk and soda out of it, not 100 dollar bottles of wine. If my kid breaks one, I am out 2 bucks, so what? I never post reviews on Amazon, but some of you people need to get a grip. If you are a normal person, that works hard for your money.... buy these glasses. You will not find glasses like these at W*lmart at any price..Fact!
customer_reviews.author: bruce hubbard

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect glasses for our house. The glass is thick and doesn't break or crack easily (a concern for us since we have elementary school children who occasionally drop or knock them over), and the overall quality is much higher than what we'd get at one of the box chains. They also arrived quickly and were well packaged to prevent any problems in transit.
customer_reviews.author: Mofessor

customer_reviews.title: chip and crack easily
customer_reviews.text: when I got glasses one had a chunk broken from bottom edge and it was not in box so I don't believe it was chipped in shipping amazon replaced the broken glass which was good of them but problem continued with these glasses we would wash them and a piece of glass would break off in dishwasher we never see any damage from dropping or something it just suddenly chips or cracks
customer_reviews.author: Greg Hill

customer_reviews.title: Just like being at the pub without the overpriced beer
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am very happy with the glasses as to their quality, feel and use. They measure a little over 5 3/4" tall x 3 7/16" wide at the top and 1/8" thick. These are not seconds as the lip is smooth without any bumps, no air bubbles to be found and the glass does not show any streaks or waves. Most glasses are this price range show at least one, if not all three characterizes. If you are looking for good pub style glasses, you have found the right ones. Want something taller, buy a different style. Maybe a large glass boot.
customer_reviews.author: W. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Quality Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I had some old pint glasses that had a white film on them that could not be removed. They were fine for me but they looked dirty to guests. I replaced them with these pub glasses. So far so good, they have been through several high temp dishwasher cycles with heat drying, and they are holding up fine. I have had no issues with these at all. They are a 16 Oz pub style glasses, often referred to as Pint Glasses. 1 pint equals 16 ounces. They will hold a 12 Oz. beer or soda can with room for a "Head" without issue. A 16 ounces of liquid would fill right up to the top/rim
customer_reviews.author: Hell Bound

customer_reviews.title: recommended
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these. I have not had any of them break thus far and I have had them for about 8 months now. They arrived boxed and pretty well packed. I have put them in the dishwasher and no issues with that. They do have some bubbles in the glass (slight imperfections) but no issues due to that.
customer_reviews.author: nuggetsnchicken

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
